verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the) (Ziphites came and said to Saul, "Is not David hiding himself among us?") Save <S%H3467><s%> me, O God, <S%H430><s%> by Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> And vindicate <S%H1777><s%> me by Thy power. <S%H1369><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> have risen <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, And violent <S%H6184><s%> men <S%H6184><s%> have sought <S%H1245><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> They have not set <S%H7760><s%> God <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> them. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is my helper; <S%H5826><s%> The Lord <S%H136><s%> is the sustainer <S%H5564><s%> of my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
He will recompense <S%H7725><s%> the evil <S%H9563><s%> to my foes; <S%H9596><s%> Destroy <S%H6789><s%> them in Thy faithfulness. <S%H571><s%>
Willingly <S%H5071><s%> I will sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Thee; I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for it is good. <S%H2896><s%>
For He has delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from all <S%H3605><s%> trouble; <S%H6869><s%> And my eye <S%H5869><s%> has looked <S%H7200><s%> [with satisfaction] upon my enemies. <S%H340><s%>
